entry.title: Pakistan's Imran Khan Tries to Pull Off a Come-From-Behind Victory
entry.content: Supporters say the prime minister and former cricket star is putting up a fierce fight to stay in power as a no-confidence vote in parliament approaches.

entry.title: Photos Chronicle Mariupol Devastation
entry.content: Satellite imagery, maps and drone footage detail destruction of the Livoberezhnyi district and sites in the center of the besieged Ukrainian city.

entry.title: Taliban Rules Impose Chaperones on Afghan Women
entry.content: Women in Afghanistan must now be accompanied by a male relative to complete many basic tasks, among a series of new measures they say threaten to squeeze them out of public and professional life.
